author: Sam Sutton
title: Murphy: Testing capacity must double before New Jersey can reopen
description: Testing capacity will need to climb to between 15,000 and 20,000 a day with 24-hour turnarounds on results, the governor said.
content:
New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy with an Exit 109 face mask | Rich Hundley/Pool
New Jersey will need to at least double its testing capacity before state officials can consider reopening major components of the economy, Gov. Phil Murphy said Monday during his dai… [+3667 chars]
